original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.29. Sanidassanattika, Cūḷantaraduka
analyzed: sani dassana ttika cūḍantara duka

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitte ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sanidassanam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ sa nidassanaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Naanidassanaappaṭigho nanasanidassano dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa
analyzed: na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ na na sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa na sa nidassanassa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye

original: purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: purejāte atthiyā a vigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho rūpī dhammo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na rūpim dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ rūpī dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe aññamaññe

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na arūpim dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ arūpī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ lokiyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na lokuttaram dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. Hetuyā ekavīsa.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca anidassana sappaṭighaḥ lokiyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta hetuyā ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na lokiyam ca na a nidassana sappaṭigham na lokiyam ca dhamma

original: paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ lokiyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na lokuttaram dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ lokuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe
analyzed: kenaci viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañcatisa ārammaṇe

original: tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
analyzed: tīṇi pe aññamaññe pannarasa pe avigate pañcatisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa,
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañcatisa

original: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi pe aññamaññe pannarasa pe avigate pañcatisa
